text:
Hi everyone,

Sometimes in my workflows I have this error (screenshot), I think it's because of HubSpot limitations API rate or something like that, is there a way to filter that in my `catch` of my custom code ? I would like to trigger a zap that send us a message when there is an error in a custom code but avoid this error, since this is not really an error and HubSpot will automatically make it work some minutes later.
If I test myself a custom code I will never get this error because limitations will not be reach, so I can't know how to filter that in my catch..
Thank you for your help !
Hi Deepak, we don't allow <https://developers.HubSpot.com/slack/code-of-conduct#unwanted-solicitation-of-services|self-promotion> in this channel. Please re-post in <#C0121KGC6RM|showcase>
I'm trying to pull a value off a custom blog module into an RSS Listing -- and can't seem to grab the value. Does anyone know how to do this??
I was using the {{ rec_post.widget_data }} dict
I set a default menu under Website>Navigation. How do I make that the default menu in my header.html file?

:sparkles:Slack Tips and Best Practices:sparkles:

To get the most out the HubSpot Developer Slack, follow these best practices:

• Will your post/question potentially help more than one person? Ask in a public channel instead of 1:1 DMs to help as many folks as possible. 
• Thread all replies to keep topics organized and searchable
• Thread followup questions/comments to your original post
• Don't post the same question in multiple channels. If you must, link to your original question in new channels.
More <https://slack.com/blog/collaboration/etiquette-tips-in-slack|great tips here>. Thanks for making the HubSpot Developer Slack easier to use for everyone!
Does anyone have tips on how to develop responsive modules? . Theres no way to edit via the UI right?
Using CSS is your best bet.
Hello , Does any one know how I can automate and send multiple attachements with mail in HubSpot through form integration .I’m new to HubSpot, any help is highly appreciated
